QuestData.Title: Nazgrim's Command
QuestData.Description: You have a comfortable base of operations, no Alliance around for miles, and a few Horde veterans by your side. It looks like it's time to start painting this continent red.$b$bGeneral Nazgrim should know where to start.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to General Nazgrim at Strongarm Airstrip in the Jade Forest.
